I see a couple libraries for this.  So wearables' is not built-in? I didn't notice it either in the main tutorial.

np
Posts.HTML:
I see a couple libraries for this. So wearables' is not built-in? I didn't notice it either in the main tutorial.

Posts.EditableText: Wearables is not built-in.  Correct.  If you have some complex things going on with what you wear/equip and are comfortable using the libraries certainly persue the use of libraries.  If you have a simple wearable dilemma (being able to wear just a couple items), I've got a fairly easy solution to that.  Let us know.
